   sphinx-quickstart on Tue Apr 12 13:44:56 2016.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to UK Postal Code and Validation's documentation!
=========================================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

Quickstart Usage:

INSTALL:: 
    
    pip3 install https://github.com/jquiterio/ukpc.git

or unzip https://github.com/jquiterio/ukpc/archive/master.zip

if unziped::
   
    cd /path/to/unziped/foleder/
    python3
    >>>import ukpostalcode

VALIDATION::

    ukpostalcode.isvalid("OX1 2JD")
    
    >>>True

FORMAT::

    ukpostalcode.format_postalcode("OX12JD")
    
    >>>'OX1 2JD'

or::

    ukpostalcode.format_postalcode("O X 12J D")
    
    >>>'OX1 2JD'

========
